definition:
Let $\{ X_t\mid t \in T \}$ be a stochastic process such that
${\ensuremath{\operatorname{Var}}}[X_t] < \infty$ $\forall t \in T$. The
*autocovariance function* of $\{ X_t \}$ is $$\begin{aligned}
\gamma_X ( r, s ) & {:=}& {\ensuremath{\operatorname{Cov}}} ( X_r, X_s )\\
& = & {}{E}\big[ ( X_r -{}{E}[X_r] ) ( X_s -{}{E}[X_s] ) \big]
\hspace{1cm} \forall r, s \in T.\end{aligned}$$
